p: At a glance, anaesthesiology and epidemiology seem to have little in common. But, from its inception, anaesthesiology has had a major impact on public health. John Snow, considered by many as the father of epidemiology, and Jerome Adams, the current Surgeon General of the USA, are both anaesthesiologists. This serendipity reflects the historic spectrum of events over which anaesthesiology has made extensive contributions to the management of epidemics.
